fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Tetris Formation:** Each night, you can select two players to "stack" together in a Tetris formation. They will be unable to perform any actions for that night and the following day, as their minds are consumed with the urge to fit together. This action will be publicly announced.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, your Tetris Formation becomes **Hypnotic Tetris**: Instead of rendering the players unable to perform actions, it will cause them to target each other with their night actions. The original targets of their actions will be replaced with each other. This action will not be publicly announced.
- You are immune to role blocks and witch control while performing a Tetris Formation.
- If a player dies while stacked in a Tetris Formation, their death will be delayed by one night, as their bodies inexplicably merge together. On the delayed night, their roles will be revealed individually, and any investigative results on them will appear as if they were a separate player.
- You cannot select the same two players for a Tetris Formation on consecutive nights.
- You cannot stack yourself in a Tetris Formation.
- You have no control over the actions the stacked players perform on each other while under the influence of Hypnotic Tetris.
